items.question: What businesses do you serve?
items.answer: SIRONIC specializes in small and medium-sized enterprises, but we also offer solutions for larger companies based on unique needs. Whether it's system administration support, network building, or web development ‚Äì we find the ideal IT solution for every business.

items.question: How is SIRONIC different from other IT providers?
items.answer: We are not just 'fixers' ‚Äì we proactively monitor systems, prevent problems, and communicate in human language. We don't let IT be an obstacle, but rather forge a competitive advantage from it.

items.question: How fast do you react to an error report?
items.answer: Generally, we react within 1‚Äì4 hours, in urgent cases even immediately. For our subscription partners, we provide guaranteed response times.

items.question: Do you undertake on-site visits or only provide remote support?
items.answer: Yes, both! We resolve most errors remotely, but if necessary, we also go to the site personally.

items.question: Do you create websites completely from scratch?
items.answer: Naturally. We develop unique, responsive websites with modern technologies (Next.js, React, Tailwind), and ensure the site is fast, secure, and search engine optimized.

items.question: What is CRM Pro and how does it help my business?
items.answer: CRM Pro is a custom-developed customer management system that makes sales processes transparent, automates administration, and can be integrated with existing systems. Available in a price range accessible to smaller companies too.

items.question: What security measures do you apply?
items.answer: We use modern firewalls, data backup solutions, encryption, and access management. We design all our systems to be GDPR-compliant, so data security is default.

items.question: In what form can we contract with you?
items.answer: We work in two main constructions: ad-hoc assignment (for occasional tasks) and monthly maintenance contract (permanent operation and support). Both are transparent, with fixed pricing.

items.question: How much does website or system development cost?
items.answer: Basic websites start from 250,000 HUF, while the price of unique systems or CRM solutions is determined depending on functionality. We give a precise price quote before every project.

items.question: Why is it worth choosing cloud-based solutions?
items.answer: The cloud is fast, secure, and flexible ‚Äì no need to maintain your own server, data is always available, and expansion can be solved in moments.

aboutPage.title: About Us
intro: SIRONIC IT Solutions started during the COVID period when every business had to rethink its IT operations. Since then, we have been continuously evolving and keeping up with the rapid changes in the IT world ‚Äì because we believe technology can be an advantage, not a burden, for every company.
Our goal is that small and medium-sized businesses shouldn't have to struggle with IT problems. We don't just maintain systems ‚Äì we provide stability, security, and peace of mind for operations.
Whether it's system management, network building, data security, or web development, with us, every IT solution is in one hand ‚Äì fast, transparent, and in human language.

mission.title: SIRONIC's Mission
paragraphs: We know that for a small or medium-sized business, IT shouldn't be an obstacle ‚Äì it just has to work, every day, flawlessly. A downtime, a slow network, or an outdated security setting can cause serious losses today.

That's why we created SIRONIC IT Solutions: to make professional yet affordable IT background available to every company. You don't need to hire your own system administrator, you don't need to build complex or expensive infrastructure ‚Äì we take care of everything.

Our services cover the entire IT operation: system management, network building, data backup, IT security, firewall management, web development, and IT training. We always adapt to current technologies, so our clients can be sure their business IT systems are up-to-date and secure.
SIRONIC provides not just IT ‚Äì but peace of mind, predictability, and support. We are the ones you can reach anytime if there's a problem ‚Äì and often we solve it before you even notice.
We treat every client as a partner, not just maintaining their systems, but caring for their operations in the long term.

euPresence.title: European IT Presence ‚Äì Support Without Borders
paragraphs: SIRONIC operates not only in Hungary ‚Äì we have a European-wide presence, supporting businesses with both remote and on-site IT services across the EU. Whether it's custom software development or system operations, our team is ready to assist anywhere in the European Union.

Our remote-first operations enable us to provide IT support in 16 languages and respond quickly to any European client's needs. With modern project management tools and communication platforms, distance is no barrier.

Our services are used by SMBs operating in multiple EU member states ‚Äì from custom application development to IT consulting. Whether it's German, Austrian, Slovak, Czech, Polish, or Romanian market presence, SIRONIC helps ensure your IT infrastructure remains competitive across the EU.

items.answer: Absolutely. We work remotely with clients across the EU (Austria, Germany, Slovakia, Czech Republic, Romania, and more). All communication in English, German, or other EU languages. We can also provide on-site kickoff meetings if needed.

items.question: What if I only have a rough idea, not detailed requirements?
items.answer: That's completely normal. We start with a free discovery call to understand your business challenge. We'll help you refine requirements, prioritize features, and define a realistic scope.

items.question: Are your solutions GDPR-compliant?
items.answer: Yes. All software we build follows GDPR best practices: data minimization, user consent management, right to deletion, and EU-based hosting options. We can also assist with GDPR compliance consulting.

items.question: What's the payment structure?
items.answer: Typically 30% upfront, 40% at midpoint milestone, 30% at delivery. For ongoing projects, we can also work on monthly retainers. All payments are invoiced (EU VAT-compliant).

items.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance after launch?
items.answer: Yes. We offer maintenance packages starting at ‚Ç¨200/month covering updates, bug fixes, security patches, and minor enhancements.  We don't build and disappear ‚Äî we're here for the long term.

items.question: Can you integrate with our existing systems (CRM, ERP, etc.)?
items.answer: Absolutely. We have experience integrating with Salesforce, HubSpot, SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, custom APIs, and more. We'll assess integration complexity during discovery.

items.question: What if we need changes or new features after launch?
items.answer: We provide ongoing development services. You can request enhancements via monthly retainer or one-off project pricing. We prioritize existing clients for urgent requests.

items.question: How do you ensure code quality and security?
items.answer: We follow industry best practices: TypeScript for type safety, code reviews, automated testing, security audits, and regular dependency updates. All code is documented and version-controlled (Git).

items.question: Can you help us migrate from an old system to a modern one?
items.answer: Yes. We've successfully migrated clients from WordPress, PHP, .NET, and legacy systems to modern Next.js/React stacks. We plan migrations carefully to ensure zero downtime and data integrity.

items.question: Do you work in Agile/Scrum?
items.answer: Yes. We use agile methodology with weekly check-ins, incremental deliveries, and continuous feedback loops. You're involved throughout, not just at the end.
